name: Frog Flip!
description:
Welcome to Frog Flip!

In Frog Flip!, you play as a frog, wanting more out of life, deciding to reach for the stars and jump its way to outer space! Along the way, utilize many unique power-ups to help your frog on his journey, and collect coins and Frog Energy for your character!

Any coins you collect can be used to purchase one of the 60+ unlockable frog skins and accessories to make your frog suit you! You can also use Frog Energy to add permanent buffs to your frog on his journey!

Will you be able to make it all the way to space with your frog friend??
